name: Rubezh
description:
Rubezh: Alpha is a set of several combat missions of the future game Rubezh: Pact of Kolmanov. In each of the levels four or five heroes are fighting with opponents of varying degrees of marginality. The Alpha target is a test of combat mechanics. In this version there are no: dialogues, plot, animations...

Heroes are residents of the inhabited asteroid complex. Features of technical development on the one hand allows them to travel in outer space, on the other hand - the battle takes place on pneumatic rifles and melee weapons. The world of the game is a satire for the life of office workers and a modern geopolitical situation.
